divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side letting my 2 dogs in Brutius and sammy. Next thing you know I see a circular shape in the sky with Blue, Yellow and Red lights but the yellow one was a spotlight in the center. Also I noticed the shape was going in a curved sort of direction so I screamed for my father and next thing you know it dissapierd behind the guys across the streets house but way off near the woods. That's what I saw and am still wondering what it is.
Summary: Circle shape,Red,Blue lights, Yellow spotlight, Tiles from what I saw, lights were not Blinking
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in New Brunswick
There were no other sightings in New Brunswick on or around October 23rd 2010
